entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as a person who was considered by someone and had his face stamped by that person. He felt pain in his nose and blood spurted everywhere.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is mentioned as a person who dragged the Cloak out from under Harry's body and threw it over him. He also left the compartment after taking care to tread on Harry's fingers.

entities.name: the train
entities.description: The train is mentioned as a vehicle that will be back in London by the time Harry is found.

entities.name: london
entities.description: London is mentioned as a location where the train will be back by the time Harry is found.

entities.name: the cloak
entities.description: The Cloak is mentioned as an object that was dragged out from under Harry's body and thrown over him by Malfoy.

relationships.description: Malfoy attacked Harry by stamping on his face, breaking his nose, and making blood spurt everywhere.
Malfoy used the Cloak to cover Harry after dragging it out from under him.
Harry will be found in London by the time the train is back.
